socketedItems.secDescrText: Channel lightning through your hands, adding lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, lightning bolts will strike enemies around you for a short duration. The lightning bolt damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Adds 12 to 49 Lightning Damage to Spells
Adds 12 to 49 Lightning Damage to Attacks
